channel.title: @@ i need some no-ip help! @@
channel.description:
I need some help, on setting my no-ip up, because it won't work.
So here are some screen shots...
Rounter Rule= [url=http://img475.imageshack.us/img475/672/linksysks6.png]http://img475.imageshack.us/img475/672/linksysks6.png[/url]
No-Ip Pic= [url=http://img475.imageshack.us/img475/7762/noipyg6.png]http://img475.imageshack.us/img475/7762/noipyg6.png[/url]
Error Con. to Server= [url=http://img387.imageshack.us/img387/7513/servdownur2.png]http://img387.imageshack.us/img387/7513/servdownur2.png[/url]
[glow=red,2,300]DONT FORGET TO ZOOM IN OR YOU WONT BE ABLE TO SEE PICTURE![/glow]
(Had to re-make thread, because "Bumping" was against the rules)
This time I added pictures, that might help. Post here if you have any ideas, or if you want me to post a picture of something else. Yes, my firewall is down and on top of that I even added it to the "Except" tab.
~Thank You~

item.title: @@ i need some no-ip help! @@
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Hhmm…

That doesn’t work either. Hamachi doesn’t effect this in anyway does it? Because mine is on right now, Ill try turning that off. Then Ill go back to No-IP and delete that current one and make a new one over then wait a couple minutes and see if it works then.
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 10:12:20 PM[/size][hr]Nope, it still doesn’t work. I don’t know what Im doing wrong.
[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 10:31:08 PM[/size][hr]Well, Only way I can Advt. my server is Posting my Hamachi Network Name and Pass, along with my port? Ill start that now then[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 10:48:17 PM[/size][hr]Again, If anyone knows whats going wrong. Post here or PM me please.

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: @@ i need some no-ip help! @@
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Put it in both ;). Starts at 43594 ends at 43594.

Read full topic

item.title: @@ i need some no-ip help! @@
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Ok, so the Port starts at “0” and ends at “43594”?

Thats what I had before, but that didn’t work.

I’ll try Start at “43594” to Ends “0”

(And Thanks :D)

Read full topic

item.title: @@ i need some no-ip help! @@
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Hi, make sure that your router is opening port 43594 the one which runescape uses.

Also, your post is a good example of how to ask a question…provide lots of information, screenshots if possible, and ask in a coherent intelligent way. Congratulations.

Read full topic
